name: Autofy
0:
”Alexa, turn on AC”
”Alexa, turn off AC”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Autofy devices such as switch, dimmer, garage door and curtain controllers can control a variety of appliances in your home, office, shops, and establishments. These appliances could be a simple night bulb to a 2 ton AC consuming 3000W of power or a dimmable light to a multi speed fan with a manual regulator. The manually operated devices now get transformed to be managed under the umbrella of Autofy Automation solution and voice controlled via Alexa. 

The skill currently supports Autofy Switches. To sync your Autofy devices with Alexa perform the following steps:
- Enable the skill
- Login with your Autofy account to link your account with Alexa.
- After successful sign in, click on discover devices to sync all your Autofy devices to Alexa 
- Use voice to control your devices or manually operate them from the Alexa app.
